title: Quake rattles Indonesia's Sumatra island killing at least 2 people
description: A magnitude 6.1 earthquake struck inland near the western coast of Indonesia's Sumatra island on Friday, killing at least two people and causing tremors that were felt in neighboring Singapore and Malaysia, officials and witnesses said.
content: JAKARTA, Feb 25 (Reuters) - A magnitude 6.1 earthquake struck inland near the western coast of Indonesia's Sumatra island on Friday, killing at least two people and causing tremors that were felt in â€¦ [+2344 chars]
